titleStmt.title: A continuation of the late proceedings of His Majesties army at Shrewsbury, Bridge-North, and Manchester: with a particular relation of the actions and strength therof, and likewise of the preparations of His Majesties removall towards London, York, or elsewhere. Written by a good hand from the army.
titleStmt.author: Good hand from the army.
